description: Discover the best hotels in Yanuca Island, Fiji. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Fiji Iconic Shangri-La Escape on Yanuca Private Island with Private Beach
hotels.description: Succumb to total relaxation at the Shangri-La Yanuca Island, Fiji, a blissfully laidback resort located on the private Yanuca Island. This idyllic haven is the perfect oasis for families and couples who want to escape the rest of the world and soak up the serenity. Boasting a seemingly endless myriad of ingredients for an unforgettable stay - including five waterfront restaurants, three relaxed bars, three expansive pools (including a kids' pool and an adults-only pool for Reef Wing guests), a private untouched beach with preserved reefs, a kids' club, serene spa, complimentary tennis courts, games room and much more - this beautifully renovated, sun-kissed resort will leave you spoiled for choice.

seo.title: Hotels in Yanuca Island - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Yanuca Island, Fiji with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
